From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Quickstrike:










Quickstrike came across a thin dead forest, leaveless and dark. It was a 
perfect place to rest. When Megatron was through with his battle, they could 
always find him, calling him through comm-link. He looked around at first, 
watching for Hell Beast's soldiers and the Maximals. He was already tired of 
this. All he wanted was: rest and repair. He didn't like being on the run. 
That slagging ship! If the shields were strong enough they wouldn't be in 
this mess. She was nothing compared to the Darkside. The Darkside was a ship 
he was used to.

He quietly entered the forest, watching where he stepped his many legs. He 
was careful not to make any loud cracks with the dry, dead branches. He 
visioned spun and his head went light.

Not again. He didn't want to pass out. Someone could catch him. He looked 
around for a place to shelter until all of this passed. He kept moving, 
stepping to the side unexpectedly with his bad balance with the dizziness. 
What was this poision?

He eyed a large tree lying on its side. He crawled over to it. He went to 
the bottom half of it and saw that the center of it was hollowed.

It was perfect. It was large enough for him to fit his body into it and rest 
there. He poked his head into it, to make sure there wasn't any little 
animal ready to bite his face. It was empty and dark inside. With his 
somewhat poor sense of smell, he sniffed. He didn't smell anything that 
seemed threatening. It was just a dirty, moldy smell.

He crawled inside, a little too easy, since he hadn't had anything to eat in 
days. He was loosing weight...fast. He never got to grab anything for 
himself since his return from Asia. He was starving. But for now, all he 
wanted to do was rest. Food would come later.
